item.title: Inside the Explosive Meeting Where Trump Officials Clashed With Elon Musk
item.description: Simmering anger at the billionaire’s unchecked power spilled out in a remarkable Cabinet Room meeting. The president quickly moved to rein in Mr. Musk...

item.title: Fed in No Hurry to Adjust Rates Amid Trump Policy Uncertainty
item.description: Jerome H. Powell says the Fed is focused on separating “signal from the noise,” as the president whipsaws on tariffs.

item.title: More Than 140 Killed in Clashes Between Syrian Forces and Assad Loyalists
item.description: Two days of fighting along the Mediterranean coast were among the bloodiest battles since rebels ousted the dictator Bashar al-Assad.

item.title: Facing the Looming Threat of A.I., Publishers Turn to Decentralized Platforms
item.description: Facing the looming threat of A.I. as a competitor, some publishers are considering an alternative to the internet’s all-powerful algorithms.

item.title: What We Know About the Clashes in Syria
item.description: Dozens have been killed in fierce clashes between government forces and gunmen loyal to the Assad regime, in a serious challenge to the country’s new ...
